scripts.clean: rm -rf ext; rm -rf .sencha; rm -rf app/.sencha; rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf app/node_modules
scripts.bundle-all: sencha --cwd app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production App --all --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-win-32: sencha --cwd app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production App --platlform=windows --arch=32 --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-win-64: sencha --cwd app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production App --platlform=windows --arch=64 --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-osx: sencha --cwd app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production App --platform=osx --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-lin-32: sencha --cwd app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production App --platlform=linux --arch=x86 --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-lin-63: sencha --cwd app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production App --platlform=linux --arch=x86_64 --out build/electron
